body_html:
In Mac, Python 3.6.5

Install on this command : pip3 install caffe2

>>> import torch
>>> torch
<module 'torch' from '/usr/local/lib/python3.6/site-packages/torch/__init__.py'>
>>> torch.__version__
'0.5.0a0.dev100'

Package             Version        Location
------------------- -------------- ------------------------
....
caffe2              0.5.0a0.dev100
....
torch               0.4.0  # *I'm already install pytorch 0.4.0*
...

I thinks caffe2 on pytorch directory(just torch)

body:
In Mac, Python 3.6.5

Install on this command : `pip3 install caffe2`

```
>>> import torch
>>> torch
<module 'torch' from '/usr/local/lib/python3.6/site-packages/torch/__init__.py'>
>>> torch.__version__
'0.5.0a0.dev100'
```

```
Package             Version        Location
------------------- -------------- ------------------------
....
caffe2              0.5.0a0.dev100
....
torch               0.4.0  # *I'm already install pytorch 0.4.0*
...
```

I thinks caffe2 on pytorch directory(just torch)
